Sinopse: Description: Larry the Reindeer thinks he can fill Santa's shoes, but he's about to get more than he bargained for. When Mighty Bunion, the wicked wizard, casts a spell causing Larry to switch places with Santa, the future of Christmas rests on one simple-minded reindeer's hooves. Santa's number one elf, Benny, and three of his trusty reindeer fleet - Tinker, Terry, and Barry - set out to search for their missing boss and rescue their favorite holiday from disaster. With the clock ticking down to Christmas Eve, these North Pole heroes brave a snowy wonderland of friends and foes alike in a race against time to rescue the world's most famous sleigh-driver.—Watch_Movies
